sections.heading: to operate, defined.Approval to operate means authorization in writing issued by the Chief Water Officer to an owner who has completed construction, reconstruction, enlargement, or alteration of a dam
sections.text: SourceLaws 2005, LB 335, ยง 7;Laws 2025, LB317, ยง 273.Operative Date: July 1, 2025

46-1607.Approval to operate, defined.

Approval to operate means authorization in writing issued by the Chief Water Officer to an owner who has completed construction, reconstruction, enlargement, or alteration of a dam.

SourceLaws 2005, LB 335, ยง 7;Laws 2025, LB317, ยง 273.Operative Date: July 1, 2025
